about_the_game:
Get lost in a beautiful forest. Run around and have fun discovering new areas. Do it your way, at your pace! Collect different goodies such as pine cones for trading, wooden planks for building, and fun items like hats! How many pine cones can you find?



This game is almost entirely illustration-based! No text = No problem! No matter who you are, what language you speak, or what level of reader you are - we want you to be able to enjoy this game!



Collect cool hats and feel fashionable throughout your adventure! How many hats will you get? Find out by exploring every nook and cranny around the forest! Make new friends and help them along the way of your journey!



We are Spång Studios, a tiny and close nit group of students studying game design in Sweden! We have come together during this three month long project to develop a fun adventurous game. We are super excited to work on more projects in the future and hope to see you once again soon!
detailed_description:
Get lost in a beautiful forest. Run around and have fun discovering new areas. Do it your way, at your pace! Collect different goodies such as pine cones for trading, wooden planks for building, and fun items like hats! How many pine cones can you find?



This game is almost entirely illustration-based! No text = No problem! No matter who you are, what language you speak, or what level of reader you are - we want you to be able to enjoy this game!



Collect cool hats and feel fashionable throughout your adventure! How many hats will you get? Find out by exploring every nook and cranny around the forest! Make new friends and help them along the way of your journey!



We are Spång Studios, a tiny and close nit group of students studying game design in Sweden! We have come together during this three month long project to develop a fun adventurous game. We are super excited to work on more projects in the future and hope to see you once again soon!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Mojave
  • Processor: 1.2GHz dual-core Intel Core m3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 615
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad recommended

name: Moose Lost in the Woods

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel (r) Core (TM) i5-7440HQ CPU @ 2.80GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX
  • Storage: 500MB MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad recommended

short_description: Moose Lost in the Woods is a cozy 3D platformer without a language barrier. Explore by running, leaping, bouncing, and splashing around in Swedish forest environments, whilst stuffing your backpack with goodies!
